page.title: 02Birth of the Parish
page.content: When it was first opened in 1967 the 7 classroom school was called St. Joseph's Old Hall Road, and even though the two buildings were 0.5 of a mile apart, St.Joseph's Hope Road and St. Joseph's Old Hall Road shared the same head teacher, Mr.J.Cook. St.Joseph's Old Hall Road was soon seen to be a convenient meeting point for parishoners from the West Side of the parish, and so in December 1968, Sunday masses were started in the school. These Sunday Masses became so popular that over 500 people attended them each week. In August 1975 the parish of Holy Family,Sale Moor was founded. Earlier that year, the house at 65, Old Hall Road was bought.
